Tag and dev in this please

Devs, please reconsider ISO-8 Datamines show that the Devs are about to introduce ISO-8, a system that will allow us to modify the stats on our characters by upgrading them, presumably for $/time like Red Stars. SWGOH (a similar game) has had a system like this for a long time. Devs, please reconsider this choice. One of the best things about MSF is that it is not too difficult for new players to pick up and play on their phone. This system is going to require a lot of research and micromanagement to optimize, and as it is, it can be difficult for new players to know which characters to invest in. More micromanagement is bad for new and casual players. I get that this is a way for FoxNext to make more money, but this game is already very expensive for competitive players. There's an old saying that pigs get fat and hogs get slaughtered. If they make it too expensive and hard to stay up-to-date, they will reduce the number of players in the game and we will burn out faster. We chose this game over games like SWGOH for a reason. Don't emulate games that have alienated their player base by being too expensive and requiring so much micromanagement that they are no longer friendly to most mobile gamers.
https://www.reddit.com/r/MarvelStrikeForce/comments/h13oh8/devs_please_reconsider_iso8/?utm_source=share amp;utm_medium=ios_app amp;utm_name=iossmf
Tag a dev
